title: Jean Parra
text: Jean Parra (18 August 1938 – 25 July 2002) was a French <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Bantamweight">men's bantamweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1960 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="J%C3%B3zsef%20Nagy%20%28boxer%2C%20born%201934%29">József Nagy</a> of Hungary.
